q14.question: What is on the parchment given to Hobart?
q14.recall: The parchment given to Hobart contains runes written on it.
q14.vectordb: The parchment given to Hobart is a runic parchment with runes written on it. It is mentioned in Professor Harrington's diary and is believed to be alive and capable of flying into the fire and being burned. It is also said to be connected to the curse and the supernatural signs experienced by those who possess it. Holden retrieves the runic parchment after it tries to escape and keeps it with him.

It is also said to be connected to the curse and the supernatural signs experienced by those who possess it. Holden retrieves the runic parchment after it tries to escape and keeps it with him.

q16.question: What pursues Harrington?
q16.recall: Strange lights and various other signs of the supernatural.
q16.vectordb: Holden is pursued by strange lights and signs of the supernatural. He hears a strange noise and sees a huge demon approaching. He discovers that pages from Prof. Harrington's diary after the date of his death have been torn out. He is warned by Karswell and experiences dizziness and blurred vision. He is pursued by a runic parchment that tries to escape. He is attacked by a wild cat that turns out to be a minor demon. He is told by Karswell that a curse has been placed on him. He hears the strange noise again in his hotel corridor.
q16.hybrid: Strange lights and various other signs of the supernatural.
